participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is adventurous, playful, and enjoys exploring new worlds through video games. She has a creative spirit and loves connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_1.background: My hair is very long. I have a boyfriend who lives in Italy. I enjoy video games. I hate cooking.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Max is easygoing, thoughtful, and has a passion for nature and science. He loves to relax and enjoys sharing experiences with his friends.
participant_2.background: I love to sleep in. I have been a vegan since I was 5. I work in a lab. I have two brothers. I believe in love at first sight.

content.text: Hi there! I'm participant_1.
Hi participant_2! I'm participant_2.
I'm a long-haired vegan gamer who doesn't like to cook.
That's interesting! I love to sleep in and I'm a vegan who works in a lab.
Oh, cool! Do you have any siblings?
Yes, I have two brothers.
That's nice. What do they do for a living?
One is a lawyer and the other is a teacher.
Wow, that's impressive! What do you do for fun?
I love to go camping, hiking, and fishing.
I love to do those things too! I also like to play video games.
That's awesome! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I especially like open-world games.
Those are fun! I like to play puzzle games.
I like those too! We should play some video games together sometime.
That would be fun! What's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I love the open-world aspect of it.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore and discover new things.
I agree! It's one of my favorite games of all time.
It's definitely one of mine too!
